$comment: === VIRTUAL CODING OFFICE — QUICK START GUIDE ===
purpose:
Multi-agent AI system aligned with MCP (Model Context Protocol)
2 officers + 6 managers + 12 interns
Collaborative task processing
Memory management (ROM/RAM)
$comment_files: === PROJECT FILES — What each file does ===

files.name: INIT.json
files.purpose: This file — quick start guide & concept definitions

files.name: virtual_office.json
files.purpose: Main config — agents, tools, routing, memory. This is the 'source of truth'

files.name: MCP_STANDARD.json
files.purpose: ⚠️ DEVIATION CHECKER — read before editing virtual_office.json

files.name: agent_creator.json
files.purpose: Form schema for adding new employees (officers/managers/interns)

files.name: modules/
files.purpose: OS internals — circuit components + infrastructure, always FREE

files.name: tools/
files.purpose: Purchasable items — both SKILLS (actions agents do) and OBJECTS (things agents use)

$types.skill: An action or process an agent can execute (e.g., triage, moderation)
$types.object: A thing or space an agent can use (e.g., conference_room, dashboard)

files.name: basecode.json
files.purpose: OS orchestrator — references modules/, defines execution order

mcp_compliance.why_mcp: Purpose-built for AI agents, less abstraction fog, algebraic routing

concepts.$comment_primitives: --- MCP PRIMITIVES (Standard, any MCP system understands these) ---

tool.what: Executable function for AI to invoke

concepts.$comment_custom: --- CUSTOM CONCEPTS (Our extensions, prefixed with _ in config) ---

bus.what: Algebraic communication channel for inter-agent coordination
key_features: Mei controls validation threshold based on urgency

skill.what: Modular process that any agent can invoke at runtime
skill.example: triage (decomposes tasks, assesses urgency, sets validation threshold)
skill.key_principle: Skills are DECOUPLED from agents — defined in their own JSONs

skill_levels.what: Permission tiers that constrain which agents can access which skills
skill_levels.purpose: Limit LLM scope, reduce bloat, keep focus sharp

hierarchy.A: Officers only — triage, bus access, override capabilities
hierarchy.D: Basic — anyone can use (e.g., get_time, lookup)

$comment_routing: === ROUTING — How tasks reach the right agent ===

routing_overview.how_it_works: Keywords in user request → match routing rules → assign agent
routing_overview.example: 'Create a logo' matches 'logo' → routes to Creative → delegates to Graphic Designer

$comment_next: === NEXT STEPS — What to do now ===

1_understand.action: Read MCP_STANDARD.json to understand the format
1_understand.why: So you don't break MCP compliance when editing

2_explore.action: Open virtual_office.json to see agents, routing, memory
2_explore.why: This is where the system is actually defined

3_customize.why: Only Creative has real interns; others need filling in

4_add_employees.action: Use agent_creator.json schema to add new officers/managers/interns
4_add_employees.why: Consistent structure for new team members

5_validate.why: Avoid deviations that could break compatibility
